item.description:
"Inception" has been getting some very interesting reactions, some rave reviews from critics, friends, and high ratings at IMDB. Come see it at New Haven's Criterion.

PRE-PARTY: If you're interested in food before the movie, post that in your RSVP, maybe something will happen. 5:30 in New Haven?

POST-PARTY: If anyone's interested in hanging-out after, I'm sure we can find some place to go for food or drink.

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957 (texting is fine too)

PARKING: Street parking is generally free after 7pm. If you're looking for a garage, the Temple St. Garage across the street from the Criterion is a good choice, since Criterion will validate your parking and your cost will be discounted.
item.how_to_find_us: Find me in the lobby at 6:30 (I'm tall, 6'3"), or text me
item.name: Wed. 7/21 - "Inception" film, possible food
